Because your w... Read this post By: Eric Enge March 17, 2008 So Many Ways to Pursue Links and So Little Time Link Building

One great way to get lots of links is to launch a massive media campaign. This works particularly well if you are a large brand. So this is not you? Well then, you are at a disadvantage. Massive media campaigns are great ways to get lots of links, and major brands launch these things without even blinking an eye.

Directories can provide a rapid way to get new links to a site. Opinions on how to approach this range from submitting to every directory in site, to being highly selective. This post will discuss what's happening under the covers to provide some perspective on how you might choose to approach it.
